resources.string: DigiLigc Smart Logistics Winner Eu Funded Project
You can search any place nearby or with-in the specified city. We will display specific or all related trotro Fares to match your bus stops.
We provide almost all the numbers of all stations and landmarks registered with us. You can perform bookings as well.
If you have a station or have fleet of Minivans a part of our growing industry with (EU, GPRTU, AMA, Google) then add your profile by following simple steps.
We will handle everything for you. As you have the app in your pocket then you don\'t have to worry about anything.
